name: Sand Creek (Upper)
description:
There are are at least two sizeable falls on upper Sand Creek.

Approach

Descent

  • R1: ~40ft.
  • R2: Plaikni Falls. ~65ft.

Exit

Red tape

Crater Lake National Park entry fee.

Plaikni Falls is a popular tourist trail. Canyoning is less well-known in this area, and sometimes hikers react inappropriately to canyoning activities, leading to degraded relations with land managers. For this reason, it may be best to descend these falls when the number of hikers will be low - particularly early in the morning and on weekdays. It is highly recommended to scrupulously follow a Leave-No-Trace ethic. Be aware that leaving anchors can annoy waterfall photographers, irk land managers, and may encourage the inexperienced / unprepared to try to follow you.
